# NavigationBarItem.TitleDisplayMode.inline

**Case**

Display the title within the standard bounds of the navigation bar.

## Declaration

```swift
case inline
```

## Getting title display modes

- **NavigationBarItem.TitleDisplayMode.automatic**: Inherit the display mode from the previous navigation item.
- **NavigationBarItem.TitleDisplayMode.large**: Display a large title within an expanded navigation bar.

items.description: Inherit the display mode from the previous navigation item.
